title: Integration Plugin Schema
description: Schema for custom integration plugins in Loki Mode

name.description: Unique integration name (lowercase, 3-50 chars, alphanumeric and hyphens)

webhook_url.description: URL to POST event payloads to

events.description: List of event types to subscribe to

payload_template.description: JSON template for the webhook payload (supports {{event.*}} variables)

headers.description: Additional HTTP headers to send with webhook requests

retry_count.description: Number of retry attempts on failure
